title: Sidewall, 1845–55
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Vertical rectangle. Chinoiserie design of eight motifs, three including human figures, two with a sort of phoenix, and three with flowers; white field covered with slender blue-gray foliage scrolls.  Printed in reds, blues, greens, and neutral oranges on white ground. Samll sections of a like paper have been cut and pasted on the front of this piece to fill losses.  Mounted on a gray paper.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sidewall, 1845–55.
1845–55. Block-printed on continuous paper. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1928-2-102.
